channel.title: Porting forward help
channel.description:
start menu run.. type cmd, then hit enter type ipconfig find your default gateway ip, from now on well call it DGip type your DGip into your internet address bar(this takes you to your router page) little box pops up, just put admin in the username or admin bit then your at the top of the page click anvanced then at the left top corner click virtual then for the name put (umm.. i cant remember what to put here lol.. someone tell me) for the private ip put the no-ip you got from www.no-ip.com (dont put blahblah.no-ip.org, put the secondary no-ip that comes with the blahblah.no-ip.org when you press create host for protocol type put both for priv port and public port put, 43594 (use this in both) for schedule put always press apply and your done
Ok now for people that read this that know exactly whats right and whats wrong with my little tut thing.. please tell me.. cuase i did that, thats what someone told me to do exactly, but it didnt end up working
so someone please post how to do it, and what parts i got wrong.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 08:26:03 AM[/size][hr]someone post a proper tut pls.

item.title: Porting forward help
item.dc:creator: @Blain Blain
item.description:
@Blain wrote:

start menu
run…
type cmd, then hit enter
type ipconfig
find your default gateway ip, from now on well call it DGip
type your DGip into your internet address bar(this takes you to your router page) little box pops up, just put admin in the username or admin bit
then your at the top of the page click anvanced
then at the left top corner click virtual
then for the name put (umm… i cant remember what to put here lol… someone tell me)
for the private ip put the no-ip you got from www.no-ip.com (dont put blahblah.no-ip.org, put the secondary no-ip that comes with the blahblah.no-ip.org when you press create host
for protocol type put both
for priv port and public port put, 43594 (use this in both)
for schedule put always
press apply and your done

Ok now for people that read this that know exactly whats right and whats wrong with my little tut thing… please tell me… cuase i did that, thats what someone told me to do exactly, but it didnt end up working

so someone please post how to do it, and what parts i got wrong.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 08:26:03 AM[/size][hr]someone post a proper tut pls.
